{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3754765,"name":"Murilo Miranda Santos","username":"murilo404","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/49beb7/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-10-03T17:43:11.091Z","cooked":"

Good morning everyone! My FRC team is currently having problems during the automatic phase. Among the main issues is that AutoBuilder only calls the name of a path, which is “New Auto.” Otherwise, it doesn’t move. Furthermore, even when entering the name it follows, it goes past the target and tends to be a considerable distance away in the simulation. Therefore, I ask Chief Delphi, what could it be? I will be making our test code available. All help is welcome. Thank you all in advance.

github.com
